trans-unit.source: Represents the scrollbar of a chart axis.
trans-unit.target: Representerer rullefeltet for en akse for diagrammet.

trans-unit.source: The AxisScrollBar class is exposed as the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.ScrollBar%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis> class.
trans-unit.target: Klassen AxisScrollBar er utsatt <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.ScrollBar%2A>for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis>klasse.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.ScrollBar%2A>

trans-unit.source: Scrollbars allow the end user to scroll through data when a subset of data is being displayed.
trans-unit.target: ScrollBars tillater brukeren å bla gjennom dataene når et delsett av dataene som vises.

trans-unit.source: A subset of data is referred to as a view, and is represented by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AxisScaleView> class.
trans-unit.target: Et delsett med data kalles en visning, og representeres av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AxisScaleView>klasse.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AxisScaleView>

trans-unit.source: Scrollbars are only shown when zooming occurs.
trans-unit.target: ScrollBars vises bare når zooming forekommer.

trans-unit.source: In other words, even if a scrollbar is enabled, it will only be visible when a view is being displayed.
trans-unit.target: Med andre ord, selv om en rullefeltet er aktivert, vises det bare når en visning som vises.

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > To fix the position of scrollbars, the plotting area position of a chart area must not be set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ElementPosition.Auto%2A>.
trans-unit.target: > [!IMPORTANT] > For å løse posisjonen på rullefeltet tegneområdet område-posisjon for et diagramområde må ikke være satt til <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ElementPosition.Auto%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ElementPosition.Auto%2A>

trans-unit.source: To explicitly set the plotting area position, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.InnerPlotPosition%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: For å eksplisitt angi tegneområdet område-posisjon, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.InnerPlotPosition%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.InnerPlotPosition%2A>

trans-unit.source: To display scrollbars when a chart is first displayed, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AxisScaleView> class properties and methods so that a view is initially displayed to end users.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil vise scrollbars når et diagram vises først, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AxisScaleView>klasse egenskaper og metoder slik at en visning i utgangspunktet vises til sluttbrukere.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AxisScaleView>

trans-unit.source: The background color, button color and width of scrollbars can be set using this AxisScrollBar class.
trans-unit.target: Bakgrunnsfargen, knappefarge og bredden på rullefeltet kan angis ved hjelp av denne AxisScrollBar-klassen.

trans-unit.source: Note that there are two main types of scrolling: large scrolling, which occurs when the end user clicks in the background of a scrollbar—that is, that part of a scrollbar not covered by the thumb; and small scrolling, which occurs when the end user clicks a left/right or up/down button.
trans-unit.target: Merk at det finnes to typer som kan rulling: store rulling som forekommer når brukeren klikker i bakgrunnen av en rullefeltet – det vil si at en del av en rullefeltet som ikke dekkes av følgende; og liten rulling som forekommer når brukeren klikker en venstre/høyre eller opp/ned-knappen.

trans-unit.source: To control the large scrolling size, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AxisScaleView.Size%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.ScaleView%2A> object.
trans-unit.target: For å styre store rullende størrelsen, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AxisScaleView.Size%2A>-egenskapen til det <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.ScaleView%2A>objektet.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.ScaleView%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AxisScaleView.Size%2A>

trans-unit.source: To set the small scrolling size, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AxisScaleView.SmallScrollSize%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AxisScaleView> class.
trans-unit.target: Angir lavt rullende størrelse, bruker du <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AxisScaleView.SmallScrollSize%2A>egenskapen for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AxisScaleView>klassen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AxisScaleView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AxisScaleView.SmallScrollSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AxisScrollBar"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AxisScrollBar"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis"></xref> object that uses the scrollbar.
trans-unit.target: Henter den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis"> </xref> objekt som bruker rullefeltet.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the background color of a scrollbar.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir bakgrunnsfargen for en rullefeltet.

trans-unit.source: This property can be set to any valid ARGB (alpha, red, green, blue) color.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen kan settes til en gyldig farge for ARGB (alfa red, grønn, blå).

trans-unit.source: If the value of this property is <xref:System.Drawing.Color>, the background color of the scrollbar will be determined by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.BackColor%2A> property value of the chart area the scrollbar is being used for.
trans-unit.target: Hvis verdien for denne egenskapen <xref:System.Drawing.Color>, bakgrunnsfargen på rullefeltet bestemmes av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.BackColor%2A>egenskapsverdi for diagramområdet rullefeltet blir brukt setningen for.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.BackColor%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Color>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> value that represents the background color of the scrollbar.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> verdi som angir bakgrunnsfargen for rullefeltet.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the color of the scrollbar buttons.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir fargen på knappene på rullefeltet.

trans-unit.source: Use this property to get or set the color of the left/right, up/down, reset and thumb buttons of a scrollbar.
trans-unit.target: Bruk denne egenskapen til å hente eller angi fargen på venstre/høyre, opp/ned, tilbakestilling og er følgende skal vises i en rullefeltet.

trans-unit.source: If the value of this property is <xref:System.Drawing.Color>, the color used for the buttons will be determined by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.LineColor%2A> property value.
trans-unit.target: Hvis verdien for denne egenskapen <xref:System.Drawing.Color>, fargen som skal brukes for knappene bestemmes av den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.LineColor%2A>egenskapsverdi.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.LineColor%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Color>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> value that represents the color of the scrollbar buttons.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> verdi som angir fargen på knappene på rullefeltet.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the style of the scrollbar button.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir stilen på rullefeltet-knappen.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ScrollBarButtonStyles"></xref> enumeration value.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ScrollBarButtonStyles"> </xref> listeverdi.

trans-unit.source: Gets the chart area that contains this scrollbar.
trans-unit.target: Henter diagramområdet som inneholder rullefeltet.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea"></xref> object.

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by the current instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AxisScrollBar"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Frigir alle ressursene som brukes av den gjeldende forekomsten av den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AxisScrollBar"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AxisScrollBar"></xref> class and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: Frigir uforvaltede ressursene som brukes av den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AxisScrollBar"> </xref> klasse og eventuelt frigir administrerte ressurser.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_True" name="True" href=""></xref> to release both unmanaged and managed resources;<xref uid="langword_csharp_ false" name=" false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_True" name="True" href=""></xref>å frigjøre både uforvaltede og behandlede ressurser. <xref uid="langword_csharp_ false" name=" false" href=""> </xref> frigi bare uforvaltede ressurser.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a flag that determines whether a scrollbar is enabled.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir et flagg som bestemmer om en rullefeltet er aktivert.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_True" name="True" href=""></xref> if the scrollbar is enabled for an axis, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if the scrollbar is not enabled.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_True" name="True" href=""></xref>om rullefeltet er aktivert for en akse <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> om rullefeltet ikke er aktivert.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a flag that indicates whether scroll bar is positioned inside or outside the chart area.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir et flagg som indikerer om rullefeltet plasseres innenfor eller utenfor diagramområdet.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_True" name="True" href=""></xref> if the scroll bar is positioned inside or outside the chart area; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_False" name="False" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_True" name="True" href=""></xref>om rullefeltet plasseres innenfor eller utenfor diagramområdet; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_False" name="False" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a flag that indicates whether the scrollbar is visible.
trans-unit.target: Henter et flagg som indikerer om rullefeltet er synlig.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_True" name="True" href=""></xref> if the scrollbar is visible; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_True" name="True" href=""></xref>Hvis rullefeltet er synlige. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the line color of a scrollbar.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir linjefargen på rullefeltet en.

trans-unit.source: This property represents the color used for the arrows in up/down and left/right buttons, the symbol inside the reset button, as well as the border of the entire scrollbar.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen representerer fargene som brukes for pil i opp/ned og venstre/høyre knapper, symbolet i tilbakestillingsknappen, i tillegg til kantlinjen på hele rullefeltet.

trans-unit.source: If the value of this property is <xref:System.Drawing.Color>, the line color used will be determined by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.LineColor%2A> property value.
trans-unit.target: Hvis verdien for denne egenskapen <xref:System.Drawing.Color>, linjefargen brukes bestemmes av den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.LineColor%2A>egenskapsverdi.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.LineColor%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Color>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> value that represents the line color of the scrollbar.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> verdi som angir linjefargen på rullefeltet.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the width of a scrollbar, in pixels.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir bredden på rullefeltet, i piksler.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the width of a scrollbar, which can be from 5 to 20 pixels.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir bredden på rullefeltet, som kan være fra 5 til 20 piksler.

trans-unit.source: Set this property to zero to disable a scrollbar.
trans-unit.target: Angi denne egenskapen til null for å deaktivere en rullefeltet.

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > To fix the position of scrollbars, the plotting area position of a chart area must not be set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ElementPosition.Auto%2A>.
trans-unit.target: > [!IMPORTANT] > For å løse posisjonen på rullefeltet tegneområdet område-posisjon for et diagramområde må ikke være satt til <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ElementPosition.Auto%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ElementPosition.Auto%2A>

trans-unit.source: To explicitly set the plotting area position, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.InnerPlotPosition%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: For å eksplisitt angi tegneområdet område-posisjon, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.InnerPlotPosition%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.InnerPlotPosition%2A>

trans-unit.source: The width of a scrollbar in pixels.
trans-unit.target: Bredden på rullefeltet i piksler.

trans-unit.source: The default value is 14 pixels.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er 14 piksler.

trans-unit.source: The value can range from 5 to 20 pixels.
trans-unit.target: Verdien kan være i området 5 til 20 piksler.
